description.originalText:
We are absolutely thrilled with the incredible care and support that Jonathan has provided to our 4-month-old this summer. From the very beginning, it was evident that he had a genuine passion for working with children. He not only proactively intuits and takes care of our little one's basic needs, but goes above and beyond to ensure she feels loved and engaged throughout the day. It's so sweet to see how much she adores him, as he showers her with attention and playtime, creating a nurturing and joyful environment.

One aspect of Jonathan's professionalism that stands out is his reliability and responsiveness. We can always rely on him to respond to our texts and show up when we need him, and that level of communication brings us peace of mind every day. Furthermore, we appreciate his initiative and willingness to help around the house without even being asked. It's truly a blessing to have someone who not only takes excellent care of our baby but also contributes to keeping our home clean and organized.

We are also incredibly grateful for Jonathan's commitment and flexibility. There have been numerous occasions when he stayed late to assist with our 4-year-old while I prepared dinner. His ability to multitask and handle both children with ease is impressive and greatly appreciated. Our older child has also formed a bond with Jonathan, which speaks volumes about his caring nature and ability to connect with kids of all ages.

In summary, Jonathan has been a godsend to our family. We feel fortunate to have found someone so caring, responsible, and proactive in ensuring the well-being of our children. He has truly become an essential part of our family, and we wholeheartedly recommend him to any family seeking an exceptional nanny. Thank you, Jonathan, for your outstanding dedication and love for our little ones. 

Feel free to ask Jonathan for my contact details, I would be happy to discuss further :)

description.displayText: Jonathan has been such a blessing for our family. He is the most kindhearted and reliable caregiver we have ever had. Jonathan picks up our daughter (3 years old) from school and spends the afternoon with her playing at the park, occasionally exploring the children's museum, and especially engaging with her about what she learned in school that day. Jonathan is very artistic and loves creating art with him. We were very lucky to have Jonathan work for us while we had our second daughter which helped out tremendously. Jonathan took to caring for a newborn so naturally, our trust in him grew which lead to us being worry free knowing our daughters were in such great hands. Sadly we are moving out of state and wish we could bring him with us! We know he will make another family as happy as we are!

description.displayText: My family had an excellent experience with Jonathan. He was great with our daughter who is now 11 months. He was our nanny for 6 terrific months. My mind was always at ease while at work. Besides being great with kids and possessing nurturing qualities, Jonathan has a genuine compassion that brings a smile to my baby's face when he walks into our home. He was always respectful and polite, going above and beyond (for example doing dishes without being asked or sending photos of my daughter during the day). He always adhered to my baby's nap and feeding schedule without question and happily took my direction. Jonathan continues to be our "go to" babysitter and we cannot praise his care enough.

description.displayText: Jonathan is warm, caring and dependable.  He cared for our daughter Grace (11 months) for 6 months and still babysits on occasion. Jonathan read, played games and took Grace to story time at the local library.  His nurturing spirit was always visible and he adhered to feeding and napping schedules without question.  I never had to ask him twice for anything and his reliability is without question.  The way my baby's face lit up every time Jonathan came to care for her was so comforting.  I truly cannot say enough praise--what a relief it was to leave my child in amazing care and not have to worry about her while I was at work.  I always look forward to when he babysits and knowing she is in such capable hands.
